definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那靈感是來自保險絲盒與監獄的雜交麼。

sentences.english: Comes mounted on Nomad 2 shelf, with pre-wired fuse.
sentences.chinese: 來自遊牧2貨架上，與前有線保險絲。

sentences.english: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.chinese: 牆上插座的電線短路燒斷了保險絲，電燈跟着滅了。

sentences.english: Have some candles at hand in case lights fuse .
sentences.chinese: 手邊準備點蠟燭，萬一保險絲燒斷了。

sentences.english: I could be handy mending a fuse. When your lights have gone.
sentences.chinese: 我可以幫你換保險絲，當你的燈不亮。

sentences.english: A fuse has blown, causing the lights to fail.
sentences.chinese: 一個保險絲燒斷了，致使燈滅。

sentences.english: Each surge at power-on contributed to small changes that eventually caused the fuse to open.
sentences.chinese: 上電的每個浪湧貢獻了小改變，最終導致保險絲斷開。

sentences.english: The wires in circuits are kept from heating by either fuses or circuit breakers.
sentences.chinese: 保險絲或斷電器可以保護電路中的電線不致過熱。

sentences.english: Your FUSE has blown because you have overloaded the circuit.
sentences.chinese: 你的保險絲燒斷了，因爲你讓線路超過了負荷。

sentences.english: As a result of its trilayer construction and the metals used, the fuse had memory.
sentences.chinese: 其三層構造和金屬使用的結果，使保險絲具有記憶性。

sentences.english: Fuses are selected to allow passage of normal current and of excessive current only for short periods.
sentences.chinese: 保險絲的選擇允許通過正常電流和瞬時過大電流。

sentences.english: The fuse acts as a safety device.
sentences.chinese: 保險絲起着保險裝置的作用。
保險絲燒斷了，所有的燈都滅了。

sentences.english: SIBA cylindrical ultra-rapid fuses are available in 6 different sizes.
sentences.chinese: 待職圓筒形的超快速保險絲，可在6個不同大小。

sentences.english: My curling iron always blows a fuse.
sentences.chinese: 我的捲髮鉗經常燒壞保險絲。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
